content:
@Michelle (Moseman) Miller re GF#11099

"An example, even very simple, would be very helpful to understand how Task is interaction with a request resource. Particularly, how to distinguish the variant timing related fields."

See the added examples to task. I don't understand your comment. Does this example address your comment. If not, what is missing?
I'm pretty sure that was a comment from @Hans Buitendijk , but the ballot spreadsheet probably didn't get updated to reflect I was submitting on his behalf.
@Hans Buitendijk punting the question to you.
